events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car on April 28th at an intersection. The claim has been formally filed to begin the processing.
After initial review, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the reported vehicle collision on a public road.
A claims agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned to handle the case promptly and assist the customer throughout the process.
The insurance company has officially acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured timely updates will follow.
The agent requested the customer to submit a police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to support the claim.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including official police report and detailed photos showing the collision impact points.
The investigation team began reviewing all submitted materials and coordinating with the repair shop to verify damage assessments.
Investigation of the vehicle damage and accident circumstances has been completed with findings consistent with the customer’s report.
Based on the investigation, a settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and rental reimbursement was proposed to the claimant.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication and support.
Final approval of the auto accident claim was granted following customer acceptance of the settlement terms and amount.
The settlement payment was successfully issued to the customer’s bank account to cover all approved repair costs.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and completion of vehicle repairs.
All documents and communications related to the claim were archived for future reference and regulatory compliance purposes.
